description:
An unmanned Waffe type that acts based on remote control signals they receive from the manned type in their squad. Although they are inferior to the manned type in terms of specs, these easily-manufactured mechanized weapons with their high-level offensive and defensive capabilities are the vanguard of the Dorssian blitz.
Source: aniplexusa.com
name: Nw507Un Waffe (Mujin Type)
